duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform support functions for one or more staff in one or more functional areas.
Complete, organize, and coordinate data, information, and activities for the functional area and cross-functional areas across departments.
Process customer invoices, handle customer requests, process credit memos, compile information, proofread documents and reports.
Answer phones and transfer calls, schedule or plan meetings, complete expense reports, file and do data entry, maintain office inventories and supplies.
Prepare briefs, outlines, agendas, and presentations from publications, regulations, and documents.
Be responsive to internal and external customer needs, work well across departments, be a team player, and have a positive attitude.
Demonstrate strong commitment to safety, quality, environmental awareness, and continuous process improvement.
Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or two (2) years equivalent work experience.
